items.name: Tableplus
items.description: I was using Sequel Pro for a long time, but it's not being maintained anymore. So I switched to Tableplus and I love it.

items.name: Obsdian
items.description: Obsdidian is hands down the best note taking app I have used. It's a local first note taking app, which means all your notes are stored on your computer and not on the cloud. It has a lot of features and is highly customizable. The best part is that it's free.

items.name: Cleanshot
items.description: This may be the most used app on my computer. It's like the default mac screenshot app, but on steroids. It has a lot of features like annotating screenshots, recording screen, etc. It's not free, but it's worth every penny.
